data.name: William David Vasquez Parada
data.Profile:
Professional in Systems and Telecommunications Engineering, with good communication skills, ability to solve problems, software project planning, creative skills, proactive, responsible, attention to detail, autonomous learning, leadership, and teamwork.
With experience in Research and development of BlockChain technology, development of Dapps, development of smart contracts in Solidity, Front-end development in React and Angular, back-end development and full stack development.Advanced management of programming languages such as TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Solidity, Java and advanced management of Frameworks such as Angular, React, Django, Flask, and Spring.
Interest on innovation projects focused on the latest technologies (BlockChain, IoT, AI).
